data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Fakaofo. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fakaofo, Tokelau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Fakaofo, Tokelau to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Fakaofo, Tokelau be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Fakaofo to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Fale old settlement
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Fale old settlement, Fakaofo, Tokelau.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Fakaofo, Tokelau not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 483 cultural Christians in the state of Fakaofo to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 17 believers in the state of Fakaofo the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
